version_description: Complete and well-aligned chords for all parts of the song / suggestions for playable voicings.
Complete chord sheet / intermediate with suggestinos for playable voicings.
Open G tuning mentioned, lyrics with Chords indicated over lyrics.
Complete chords / short tabs for basic patterns.

I corrected some errors in the lyrics, as well as denoted where the intros, bridges and solos are and where to add harmonica. Also uses simple chords that I have seen Petty use during live performances.
My Favorite band of all time. Signature Petty chords and all its inflections. The available chords on this did not do it justice.

performance.name: Live at The Fillmore 1997
performance.comment: recorded on one of the performormances from The Fillmore Residency 1997 tour (Jan 19, 20, 21, 24, 25, 26)

version_description: Well-aligned chords for all instrumental and vocal parts / slash chords / rhythm pattern for intro / strumming pattern (verse).
The song is shifting between the keys C and G.
Live at Farm Aid 1985 - this live version is a very easy arrangement. Includes all lyrics to the song that other versions do not have.
Well-aligned and complete chords for all parts of the song / intermediate versions with split chords and suggestions for playable voicings / short tab for verse pattern.
Complete chords in original key / easy auto-scrolling.
Based on officially published sheet music. This is downtuned D / G / C / F / A / D with no capo. Play Harmonica key G.

I've always liked this song but couldn't find any tabs of it. I found a youtube of a covers band doing the song in practice and worked it out from that.
